alert.note: Alert for Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 12 at 9:43AM CST until March 14 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yazoo River At Yazoo City affecting Yazoo County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING TO MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yazoo River At Yazoo City. * WHEN...From Sunday morning to Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Minor over bank is flooding is occurring along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Saturday the stage was 28.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 29 feet. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Yazoo River Yazoo City 29.0 28.6 Sat 9 am CST 29.0 28.9 28.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1245 AM CST.
